outputs.output_descr:
Output 1:
Gov't staff from 10 of the 35 countries under MDGI support are able to carry out sectoral need assessments (NA) and estimate sector investment requirements.
Output 2:
Regional and global knowledge on NA methods and costing techniques strengthened and links to fiscal frameworks established.
Output 3:
(1) Staff from Gov't and other relevant agencies of 8 countries are able to build, apply, & maintain country specific macro models to prepare MDG consistent macro economic frameworks (SMF) to guide the formulation of MDG based plans
(2) Regional and global knowledge on applied macro economic modelling for MDG analysis strengthened.

Output 4:
Researches and strategic papers produced on promotion of inclusive growth, reduction of inequality, and expansion of fiscal space for the MDGs.
Output 5:
Country projects and programmes in the poverty/MDG focus area developed, strengthened and aligned with national priorities and corporate standards.
Output 6:
MDG localization support in 18 countries and pilots on local poverty reduction initiatives in  8 countries developed (focusing in the areas of inclusive finance, social exclusion & social safety nets ) .
Output 7:
Regional forum and partnership for MDGs developed.
Output 8:
Regional campaign against hunger launched with the objective of galvanizing policy changes at national levels.
To Commence implementation of year 1 (2009/2010) activities following the approval of the ESCAP/UNDP/ADB "Supporting the Achievement of the Millennium Development Goals in Asia and the Pacific"

project_descr: Millennium Development Goals Initiative for Asia Pacific (MDGI) Phase II
project_title: Millennium Development Goals Initiative for Asia Pacific
